> DINOBOT paused.  The SHARKTICONS seemed to b=
e barely sentient, but reliant upon a general to give them orders ni battle=
 and direct them.  However, the GENERAL seemed to be content to hold back, =
and fighting him directly would require simultaneously engaging him AND his=
 forces.  The DINOBOT of old would have relished such a challenge, but for =
this new incarnation, 'honor' was the last thing on his processor.
> 
> Goi=
ng to try and engage the SHARKTICONS group by gruop, attempting to thin dow=
n thier numbers with hit and run tactics, counting that the groups would be=
 trying to pursue them to just overwhelm with numbers, and thus running int=
o one another and messing up their formations with each hit and run attack =
of his own, trying to thin the herd.
> 
> Meanwhile, VICE GRIP was of a dif=
ferent mindset, just going to charge in directly over towards SKYBYTE!  Of =
course, this would lead his charge right through the main cluster of SHARKT=
ICONS, and give them a golden opportunity to dogpile (or sharkpile) on him.=
